Roland Bertin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roland_Bertin 0 Roland Bertin (born 16 November 1930) is a French stage and film actor. He has appeared in at least 100 films and television shows since 1970. Roland_Bertin ( born_16_November_1930 ) is a_French_stage_and_film_actor . He has_appeared in at_least_100_films_and_television_shows since 1970 .
